text: is a Japanese actress, model, and gravure idol.http://www.box- corporation.com/?portfolios=沢井美優 Her best-known role was Usagi Tsukino/Sailor Moon in the live-action adaptation of Sailor Moon which ran from 2003 to 2004. == Modeling career == ===Photobooks=== * 2002: Miyu - * 2004: Kiss - * 2005: Miyu - * 2008: Present: Purezon - * 2013: Hitotoki - === Idol DVDs === * 2002: Me * 2002: You * 2004: Kiss * 2005: South Wind * 2005: Perfect Collection * 2005: Me→You * 2006: Snow White * 2006: Fresh:Re:Fresh * 2008: Sawai Ryu ===Digital photo and movie works=== * 2011: Colors: 3 ri no Sawai Miyu ==Filmography== ===Live-action=== *Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon, Usagi Tsukino *Kids Wars 5, Yoko Kimura *Shun (Season), Shun Sugita *A Chain of Cursed Murders, Saki *Shaolin Girl, Kanagawa Miyuu *Kamen Rider × Kamen Rider W & Decade: Movie War 2010, Erika Mutsuki *Space Battleship Yamato, Higashida *Kamen Rider Wizard, Aya Yamamoto (Episodes 47, 48, 51) *Kamen Rider Amazons, Mika (Episodes 9, 12) *Kamen Rider Ex-Aid, Tōko Suzuki (Episodes 42-44) *Kishiryu Sentai Ryusoulger, Master Pink ===Anime=== *Fullmetal Alchemist: Conqueror of Shamballa, Noah *Black Cat, Reira/Layla *GR: Giant Robo, V ==References== == External links == * * * Category:Japanese voice actresses Category:Japanese gravure idols Category:Japanese female models Category:1987 births Category:Living people
